about_the_game:
Game Info

Chrono Bullet is a bullet hell top-down shooter inspired by the classic arcade games. It tells the story about multiverses that heroes must protect, even at the cost of their lives. You will encounter many different fantasy monsters. But don’t be afraid: sleight of hand, reaction and a cool head will help you cope with them.

DEMO

In the demo version of the game you can get acquainted with the characters and one of the biomes. You will have to pass a difficult location and defeat its final boss. Access to the rest of the maps will be opened as the project develops. At the initial stage only one Demon biome will be available.

In this version of the game we provide early access to all characters - you won't have to gain EXP or do Challenges to unlock them one by one. Just choose your favourite character and go into battle!

DEMO Co-op Available - Play Together

And, of course, co-operative multiplayer. Where would we be without it?

Get together with your friends, because you will have to defend your kingdom on a piece of land that was left untouched by monsters!

You can play this game duo with your friend. Or you can gather a team of four people and try to pass biome! While we still offer a hearty slice of nostalgia and good old, simple fun to you.
